text: Donald Gary Young (July 11, 1949 â€“ May 12, 2018) was an American businessman. He was the founder, president and former CEO of Young Living, a Utah-based multi-level marketing company that offers essential oils and other alternative medicine products. Young died on May 12, 2018 in Salt Lake City due to complications from multiple strokes at the age of 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1949 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Donald Gary Young
